author: screamizh123
post_text: September 28, 2018 at 11:26 PM#1Hi! How to edit one fixture in effect?for example, I apply “pan/tilt circle” effect on a group of spots, but I want to change the min and max values to one of them, as it gets out of the general concept. I can separate this device into a separate line in this effect, with the same parameters.How can this be done differently?
title: How to edit one fixture in effect?
